info.name: [IS] Bulk import locations
info.description:
This collection will import locations from a .csv

Author: Hern√°n Aranda (a.k.a. Hernium)

# Prerequisites

Check this article to prepare everything you need: [https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources](https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources)

# Template

| **Column** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| locationName | Required. Name of the location to be created. |
| locationParent | Optional. Name of the parent location. It's only needed if this location is not a root level location. |

Source: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=1944844226](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=1944844226)

# Execution

1. Set and select the enviroment, or replace the enviroment variables with your constants
2. Create the .csv file. Make sure that your rows are ordered by depth
3. Run the collection using the .csv file
    

# Requests

query.description: Variable. You get this value from de .csv

request.description:
Get the current list of locations that match the parent's name.

Endpoint doc.: [https://webdemo.is.cloud.invgate.net/public-api/swagger/#/locations/locations_list](https://webdemo.is.cloud.invgate.net/public-api/swagger/#/locations/locations_list)
